SUBJECT NATIVE AND CITIZEN OF MEXICO CLAIMS ENTRY AS ABOVE. HE STATES THAT HE WAS NOT QUESTIONED BY ANY OFFICER AT TIME OF ENTRY. HE WAS TRANSPORTED IN AUTO OF UNKNOWEN FAMILY AD CLAIMS TO HAVE PAID NOTHING. TRAVELED TO ANEHIEM IN THE SAME AUTO. SUBJECT IS ACCOMPANIED BY SPOUSE AND FOUR CHILDREN WHO ARE AKEXX ALS ILLEGAL ALTENS. SUBJECT CLAIMS NOT TO HAVE RECEIVED WELFARE AND TO HAVE PAYED HIS INCOME TAX. SUBJECT WAS COMING TO THE U.S. TO SEEK EMPLOYMENT AND WAS NOT IN POSSESSION OF AN IMMIGRANT VISA OR LIEU DOCUMENT.
